00028 char lookupAsciCharacterFromScancode(uint8 scancode,uint32 flags)
00029 {
00030         char retch = 0;
00031 
00032         if ((flags & FLAG_CAPS_LOCK))
00033         {
00034                 retch = uppercase[scancode];
00035         }
00036         else if ((flags & FLAG_SHIFT_STATE))
00037         {
00038                 retch = shifted[scancode];
00039         }
00040         else
00041         {
00042                 retch = lowercase[scancode];
00043         }
00044 
00045         return retch;
00046 }
00047 
00048 unsigned char loadAsciKeytable(fs_node_t* node)
00049 {
00050         DEBUG_PRINT("Loading new keytable ");
00051         DEBUG_PRINT(node->name);
00052         DEBUG_PRINT("\n");
00053 
00054         if (!node) return 0;
00055         if (node->length != (256 * 3)) //Has to be the exact right size for a keytable
00056         {
00057                 if (read_fs(node, 0, 256, lowercase) != 256) return 0;
00058                 if (read_fs(node, 256, 256, uppercase) != 256) return 0;
00059                 if (read_fs(node, 256 * 2, 256, shifted) != 256) return 0;      
00060         }
00061         else
00062         {
00063                 return 0;
00064         }
00065 }
